title: Poster, "The Prepared Professional,  International Design Conference, Aspen", 1982
signed: Signed [imprinted] in blue, lower right: Paul Rand
inscribed: Imprinted in gray, lower left: Printing: Sanders Printing  Typography: Pastore DePamphilis Rampone  Paper: Champion International Corp., Paper Division
description: Poster in black depicting two targets in upper section in white, blue and red. The left target contains thirteen dots (bullet holes) in black and gray near the bull’s eye and around the target; right target contains one black dot at the bull’s eye. Lower section composed of two columns of text in gray. Left column: The / Prepared / Professional; below, ten lines of text describing topics covered during the conference; right column: International / Design Conference / in Aspen / June 13–18, ’82; below, eleven lines of text describing registration fees, lodging and other information.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, "The Prepared Professional,  International Design Conference, Aspen", 1982.
1982. Screenprint on paper. Gift of Marion S. Rand. 2002-11-11.
